title: How many rakahs of witr should we pray after Isha prayer? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: zulkar from bangladesh he says what are the number of witcher raqqas we should pray after isha the prophet allah said to us that the minimum number of raqqas recommended is one so if you pray asha prayer and you pray to raka sunna of isha this is also highly recommended not mandatory and you pray one rakha of witter this does the job it's considered to be your portion of night prayer he however used to pray 11 rakaas every night not necessarily after isha rather before fajr time so it's in the last third of the night did not limit night prayer to 11 raqqas rather he made it open when he said the night prayer is composed of two by two by two indefinitely when it comes to the technical term witter the prophet used to offer with eric sam as the following either one rakah with shahood three raka's either praying two with salaam then praying the third with a separate salam or praying all three like maghrib but without sitting in the middle for the first shahad rather only sitting at the last raqqa he used to also pray five raka's witter continuously without sitting except in the fifth raka and he also used to pray seven raka's continuously without sitting for teshahood except in their last seventh rakah and finally he used to pray nine continuous rakaas sitting on the eighth and doing first the shahood standing up to the ninth and then sitting on the ninth for the final to shahaden offering salam
